caption: Authentication Ticket
description: The Authentication Ticket object contains the attributes pertaining to a Authentication ticket.
name: auth_ticket

created_time.description: The time that the Authentication ticket was created.

encryption_details.description: The encryption details of the Authentication ticket.

expiration_time.description: The expiration time of the Authentication ticket.

is_renewable.description: Indicates whether the Authentication ticket is renewable.

properties.description: The properties of the Authentication ticket.

ticket_flags.description: The specific attributes or permissions for the Authentication ticket, such as whether it is renewable or forwardable

type.description: The type of the Authentication ticket.

type_id.caption: Type ID
type_id.description: The normalized Authentication ticket type identifier.

0.caption: Unknown
0.description: The Authentication ticket type is unknown.
